item.title: Dropping dissabled
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

I just helped a kid with this last night. For further knowledge on the subject, search ‘dropitem’ to see where it’s called, and read around that (it should be first in the packet for dropping items).

Read full topic

item.description:
@sng wrote:

[quote=“r0ckstar96, post:2, topic:287753”]the thing is, it’s not letting admins+ drop items, if you want anyone to be able to drop items, use this

public void dropItem(int droppedItem, int slot) { // misc.printlnTag("droppeditem ["+playerItems[slot]+"] which is // ["+(droppedItem+1)+"]"); boolean a = true; [/quote]

THANK YOU!

item.title: Dropping dissabled
item.dc:creator: @sng sng
item.description:
@sng wrote:

Great. :mad: my source hates me :(. I can not drop any items, because “Dropping has been disabled, use ::empty to clear your inventory” this is the code in client.java

public void dropItem(int droppedItem, int slot) { // misc.printlnTag("droppeditem ["+playerItems[slot]+"] which is // ["+(droppedItem+1)+"]"); boolean a = true; if (playerRights == 2) { sM("Dropping has been disabled, use ::empty to delete your inventoy instead."); return ; }

Read full topic
